newsitem.title: UK: LIFFE white sugar closes at day's highs.
newsitem.headline: LIFFE white sugar closes at day's highs.

text.p: LIFFE white sugar futures tracked the firmer U.S. market during evening trading, moving up to the day's highs by the close.
Near May last traded at $309.00 a tonne, up $3.20 from the pre-holiday close last Thursday. Other positions were $2.50 to $2.10 a tonne higher and turnover totalled 2,274 lots.

Traders said the firm close may encourage some follow through interest on Wednesday but much will depend on whether New York can break through top-of-range resistance above 11.00 cents a lb, basis May.
Paris white sugar ended $2.60 to $2.20 a tonne higher with near May last trading at $308.40.
